about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate developer with a focus on creating innovative solutions that bridge technology and user experience.
about.paragraph2: My expertise includes cross-platform development, full-stack web applications, and mobile technologies.
about.paragraph3: I'm always eager to learn new technologies and collaborate on projects that make a meaningful impact.
about.name: Russidan Nadee
about.description: A passionate fresh graduate from Silpakorn University with expertise in cross-platform development. I specialize in creating efficient, user-friendly applications using modern technologies like Flutter, TypeScript, and Node.js. Always eager to learn and grow, I'm ready to contribute to innovative projects and bring creative solutions to life.

skills.title: Technical Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with
skills.learning: Currently expanding my knowledge in Docker and C# .NET for advanced system development

work.title: Developer Intern
work.description: Developed Cross-platform Asset Management System with RFID integration using Flutter, Node.js, Express, and MySQL. Created full-stack solution including mobile app, web application, and Windows desktop app.

work.title: Beverage Staff
work.description: Delivered food and beverages, ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction. Managed daily operations and maintained a clean, efficient service area.

work.title: Food and Beverage Staff
work.description: Provided friendly service and assisted in food preparation. Ensured cleanliness in the kitchen and dining areas, meeting health standards.

work.title: Cook
work.description: Prepared food according to company standards. Monitored inventory to ensure sufficient stock levels.

education.title: Bachelor Degree
education.description: Electronic and Computer System - Comprehensive study of computer systems, electronics, software development, and system architecture. Expected graduation: March 2026.
